title: cmd/go: go build -v broken
body:
The verbose flag of go build should “print the names of packages as they are compiled”. But compiling the [hello word example](https://play.golang.org/p/3VsQMI4Rx5) with go version devel 9ad41f6 2016-02-21 16:36:56 +0000 linux/amd64 gives only:

```bash
$ go run -v helloworld.go 
command-line-arguments
Hello, 世界
```

I would expect at least `fmt`, `runtime`, …
